title: We need AP fighters whose autos scale AP
body: Then Riot will see why you can't expect items built for assassins to be balanced on fighters, and vice-versa.

replies.body: If everyone in the game only applied the extra AD from full assassin builds every 3rd auto, and only 70% of it, we wouldn't have problems.
Since when is she a fighter?

The only item that was an issue for Kayle  while intended for fighters was Sated Devourer, and not only was it nerfed to every 4th attack on ranged champions, that nerf is still in effect on Guinsoo's Rage.

Diana's close, but I meant 100% every attack, like how regular autos work with added AD. 

But Juggernauts are not fighters, so says Rito.
